answers.answer: ...to add obviously no fever eh! just chills probably also cause of the cold temp at this time of the year! and feeling more prone to cold!

im a diagnosed hypochondria, sumtimes i feel hot sumtimes cold. its hard to live with, docs dont take me seriously as ive been tested negative for everything diabetes, hiv u name it, after the tests u feel good for about a day then the parnoia kiks in such as did they get it wrong? did they use a clean needle? . chin up man. hypochondia is something which will stay with us forver

question: I suffer from generalized anxiety disorder especially exegerated hypochondria which then leads to depression..I've been like this for more than 2 years now! Chills like goose bumps in periods are normal symptoms of this disorder right?Tks
title: hypochondria..GAD and Depression
